# nst-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property       | Attribute      | Description                                          | Type                                                              | Default     |
| -------------- | -------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `appearance`   | `appearance`   | Button appearance, defines button look               | `"filled" \| "ghost" \| "outline"`                                | `'filled'`  |
| `custom_class` | `custom_class` | Custom class which will be attached to the classlist | `string`                                                          | `undefined` |
| `disabled`     | `disabled`     | Disabled state                                       | `boolean`                                                         | `undefined` |
| `full_width`   | `full_width`   | Full width: 100%                                     | `boolean`                                                         | `undefined` |
| `icon_left`    | `icon_left`    | Name of left icon, use material icons                | `string`                                                          | `undefined` |
| `icon_right`   | `icon_right`   | Name of right icon, use material icons               | `string`                                                          | `undefined` |
| `name`         | `name`         | Button name                                          | `string`                                                          | `undefined` |
| `no_padding`   | `no_padding`   | Optional: remove padding for ghost button            | `boolean`                                                         | `undefined` |
| `size`         | `size`         | Size of the button                                   | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small"`                                  | `'medium'`  |
| `status`       | `status`       | Button status, defines button colors                 | `"danger" \| "primary" \| "secondary" \| "tertiary" \| "warning"` | `'primary'` |
| `text`         | `text`         | Button text                                          | `string`                                                          | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event      | Description          | Type               |
| ---------- | -------------------- | ------------------ |
| `btnClick` | Emits on every click | `CustomEvent<any>` |
